review.title: “Real Estate (Evictions) law firm serving REO divisions of commercial banks, asset litigation”
review.pros: Pros – Friendly work environment, very fitting for students with interest in law
review.cons: Cons – Extremely poor management, lack of communication between seniors and staff, no structure, poor pay
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Incorporating a more strategic and intellectual device to manage processes, bettered communication with employees, better pay
